law.catch_line: Violation of bond -- Suit on bond.
law.text: The superintendent of schools of each school district shall notify the chief state school officer of any violation of any of the conditions in any bond which has been filed. If the chief state school officer finds that a violation has occurred, he shall instruct the Attorney General to bring suit on the bond. Any sum recovered in such suit shall be paid into the State Treasury.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 152, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 7.
